name: Hold The Line (itch) (pwnofprophecy)
description:
Hold The Line is a real time strategy game where you dedicate limited Supplies to deploy troops used to defend your Commander from an endless horde of enemies. Once your Commander is defeated, it’s game over. Over time the waves of enemies will increase in size, frequency, and abundance. You’ll need to think fast to dedicate the appropriate type and amount of troops to counter your enemies’ plans while also having a quick enough hand to execute your strategy in time. Everyone will eventually be overtaken by the unending onslaught of foes, but how long can you hold your ground?

How To Play

Hold The Line is played exclusively with the Mouse. All unit commands and selections are performed via the Mouse Buttons and Mouse Wheel (or the Q and E keys if you’re on a track pad). You will always have full vision of the entire battlefield and can deploy your troops anywhere you’d like. Troops are dispatched by spending Supplies in proportion to the size of the unit being deployed.

Controls

Left Mouse Button (click and drag): Scale/Orient New Unit

Left Mouse Button (release): Deploy New Unit

Right Mouse Button: Cancel New Unit Creation

Mouse Wheel or Q/E Keys: Select Unit Type!
